'''A Fragrant Feast of Flavors''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Fricassee de Poulet]] with [[Emilie]]. The recipe for Fricassee de Poulet is obtainable from [[Sanguinetti]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

A Fragrant Feast of Flavors increases all party members' attack by '''274''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
